title: You think Nature's Prophet is OP? Let me tell you about this Dota Hero named Faceless Void
body:
This is him right here

http://dota2.gamepedia.com/Faceless_Void

This guy teleports all over the fucking place and if he lands on you your move speed AND attack speed are lowered by up to 50% at rank 5. 

He has up to a 25% chance to dodge both your autos AND your spells (yes your spells included) and it stacks with evasive items (it does not add like 25+25= 50 but multiplicity such as each having its own 25% chance to dodge)

He also gets up to a 25% chance to stun you just for autoing your face and it lasts for a second and it can hit multiple times. 

And his ult? A fuckin space time rift that stops ANYTHING that enters it for 4-6 seconds. That's 4-6 seconds of free dps he gets to smack your face with.

So unless you have BKB and/or BMB you're fucked. So in other words if you feed this thing the game is over. 

Oh and he can solo roshan btw by perma stunning it and just simply killing it. Good luck dealing with this bitch.
